entry.title: [CW] Remember the "red wave" that was supposed to be coming this fall? [Not so fast](
entry.content:
Remember the "red wave" that was supposed to be coming this fall? [Not so fast](https://twitter.com/lxeagle17/status/1555700718819872773/photo/1). The Democrats have taken the lead for the first time since late laste in generic polling. The key factor seems to be SCOTUS' abortion verdict.
Biden is clearly unpopular but so is the GOP, given that they can't capitalise on it.
